UnitInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]Can Hatch a Ghola Based on Stored Genetic Data
[ICON_BULLET]May Dominate and Capture Most Fighting Enemy Units By Use of it's Nerve Gas Warhead
[ICON_BULLET]Can Range Attack with a Sonic Blast
[ICON_BULLET]Can Investigate a City[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can Shapeshift Into a Rival Spy (Check Pedia)
[ICON_BULLET]Can Investigate a City[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May Pass On a Part of Their Experiences to Another Truthsayer If Caught
[ICON_BULLET]Can Build Richesian Mirrors Instead of Solar Farms
[ICON_BULLET]Can build Sietch and Trading Post Improvements[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Dwellings may not be built until Adapted Agriculture is researched

UnitInfo.Civilopedia: A Richesian product that, although it doesn't rival the prepotent Mech units from Ix, proves that size doesn't matter. The excellency of the Richesians in Miniaturization allowed the creation of such tiny and versatile weapons: they tend to gain a nasty initiative in combat and will force their foes to pause in many different circumstances.

A product of the Richesian experiences in No-Fields and Suspensor technology, this will be the most useful and efficient Suspensor on Arrakis. It will protect itself after a fight by self-cloaking, making it hard for foes to avenge themselves, and can counter airstrikes well enough.
UnitInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]Will Gain the 'Protection Cloak' Promotion After Making an Attack If Suffered Damage

UnitInfo.Strategy: Use the Covert Bot to explore enemy territory and perform Espionage Missions.
